metadata.title: CVE-2020-35522 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - negligible.
metadata.description: In LibTIFF, there is a memory malloc failure in tif_pixarlog.c. A crafted TIFF document can lead to an abort, resulting in a remote denial of service attack.

notes.note: mdeslaur> this issue simply causes the tiff2rgba tool to abort on a malformed image, and has very little security impact.

criterions.comment: tiff package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.1.0+git201212-1ubuntu1').
